mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_screen(screen_no, screen_name, movie_no, location_no) VALUES(seq_screen_no.nextval,#{screen_name},#{movie_no},#{location_no})
mapper.select: SELECT s.screen_no, s.screen_name, s.movie_no, l.location_no, l.location_name FROM m_location l JOIN m_screen s ON l.location_no = s.location_no WHERE s.movie_no = #{movie_no}
SELECT s.screen_no, s.screen_name, m.movie_no, m.movie_title FROM m_movie m JOIN m_screen s ON m.movie_no = s.movie_no WHERE s.location_no = #{location_no}

SELECT s.location_no, l.location_name, s.screen_name, m.movie_title FROM m_screen s, m_movie m, m_location l WHERE s.movie_no = m.movie_no AND s.location_no = l.location_no ORDER BY l.location_name, s.screen_name ASC;
